title: [SOLVED]820-3437 fine with no batt, connect batt no green / orange
message:
Hi.

Got this machine in, no liquid at all.
Was no green or orange.
Was no PPBUS
Was 3V42

Changed ISL and board powers, POSTs and boots and has green / orange but only with no battery.
Connect battery and green LED flickers a little. That's it.

About to start checking current sensing.

Any clues ?

title: [SOLVED]820-3437 fine with no batt, connect batt no green / orange
message: I would do some measurements with battery connected. 3V42 even present?

title: [SOLVED]820-3437 fine with no batt, connect batt no green / orange
message:
Hang on, PPBUS is at 19 fucking volts!, that's with no batt. I'll sort this PPBUS voltage out first.
Then it drops to 8.15 with batt connected so I guesss it's loosing comms with the SMC.

To answer your question though, yes 3V42 is there with batt connected.

title: [SOLVED]820-3437 fine with no batt, connect batt no green / orange
message: That is pretty sure a dead ISL6259 and the FET. It does commonly kill the battery too....

title: [SOLVED]820-3437 fine with no batt, connect batt no green / orange
message:
[QUOTE="dukefawks, post: 29250"]That is pretty sure a dead ISL6259 and the FET. It does commonly kill the battery too....[/QUOTE]

Working.
Many thanks Duke.
